attributes.action: All sub-contractors Should be entitled to 4 weeks holiday paid.
attributes.background: Self employed sub-contractors should be entitled to 4 weeks holiday pay after working with the same company for more than 3 months. I have been with a company more than a year and they pay through a third party to get around this and it's not fair.

rejection.details:
We understand that you want sub-contractors to be entitled to holiday pay, but it's not clear what you want the Government or Parliament to do to achieve this.

You could start a new petition calling for the Government to create a new entitlement to holiday pay for self-employed sub-contractors.
